sqlQuery:
SELECT DISTINCT
    (CASE WHEN MAR.AD_FASTREF = 'R' THEN LTRIM(RTRIM(PRO.REFFORN)) ELSE LTRIM(RTRIM(CAST(PRO.CODPROD AS VARCHAR))) END) AS ProductId,
    1 AS IsAvailable,
    2 AS StorageId,
    'Bel Lub' AS StorageName,
    21 AS ResellerId,
    'Bel Lube' AS ResellerName,
    1 AS ProductDefinitionId,
    LTRIM(RTRIM(PRO.DESCRPROD)) AS ProductName,
    (CASE WHEN ISNULL(EST.SALDO, 0) <= 0 THEN 0 ELSE EST.SALDO END) AS Quantity,
    1 AS MinimumQuantity,
    0 AS HandlingTime,
    'false' IsExternalStockEnabled,
    0 ExternalStockHandlingTime,
    PRO.CODPROD,
    PRO.CODVOL,
    PRO.ORIGPROD,
    PRO.CODMARCA
FROM
    TGFPRO PRO
        INNER JOIN
    TGFMAR MAR
    ON PRO.CODMARCA = MAR.CODIGO
        AND MAR.AD_FAST = 'S'
        AND MAR.AD_FASTREF IN ('C', 'R')
        LEFT JOIN
    (
        SELECT
            EST.CODPROD
             , SUM(EST.ESTOQUE - EST.RESERVADO) AS SALDO
        FROM
            TGFEST EST
        WHERE
            EST.CODEMP = 26
          AND EST.CODLOCAL = '99000000'
        GROUP BY
            EST.CODPROD
    ) EST
    ON PRO.CODPROD = EST.CODPROD
